#set the data lake file location:
file_location = "abfss://project@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/sell_cycle_2022.csv"
 
#read in the data to dataframe df
df = spark.read.format("csv").option("inferSchema", "true").option("header", "true").option("delimiter",",").load(file_location)
 
#display the dataframe
display(df)

df.printSchema()

#read in the data to dataframe df

#display the dataframe
display(df)

#import necessary python libraries

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
#conn = connect(':memory:')

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 


CREATE TABLE etlhubConfirmed.SELL_CYCLE_2022
     (SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE string,  
      SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME string,  
      SSM_STEP_NO string,  
      SSM_STEP_NAME string)

%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DBXDH.DHTS_SELL_CYCLE_2022
USING CSV
LOCATION 'abfss://project@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/sell_cycle_2022.csv'
